description: Economic or environmental things (material or digital), media of exchange, which agents agree should be accounted for and which can be inventoried.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for the resource.

conformsTo.description: Reference to a vf.knowledge.resourceSpecification this resource conforms to.

primaryAccountable.description: The agent with primary rights and responsibilities for the resource.

accountingQuantity.description: The current amount the agent has primary rights to.

onhandQuantity.description: The current amount under direct control of the agent.

trackingIdentifier.description: Any identifier used to track a singular resource, such as a serial number.

currentLocation.description: Reference to a vf.geo.spatialThing for the current physical location.

currentVirtualLocation.description: The current virtual place a digital resource is located.

currentCurrencyLocation.description: The current virtual place a currency resource is located (e.g. bank account, crypto wallet).

stage.description: Reference to a vf.knowledge.processSpecification representing the last process stage.

state.description: The state of the resource after coming out of a test or review process.

containedIn.description: Reference to another vf.observation.economicResource that contains this one.

contains.description: References to vf.observation.economicResource records contained in this resource.

unitOfEffort.description: Reference to a vf.knowledge.unit used for effort-based actions.

classifiedAs.description: Classification URIs or tags for categorization.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the resource.

image.description: URI to an image relevant to the resource.

imageList.description: URIs to images relevant to the resource.
